A

actionTurn(int) - Method in class Game
If the passed in selection is valid the relevant object will be created and core method started

B

Borrow - Class in <Unnamed>
Class which stores the information relating to the borrow action.
Borrow(Player, Shark) - Constructor for class Borrow
Default constructor which creates an an object derived from the Borrow class.
borrowFish() - Method in class Borrow
The core method of the class, prompting for a loan amount and validating this against relevant rules.

C

calculateFishCaught(String) - Method in class Catch
Method to assess the value of fish caught based on random fish, min/max values of that fish and its relationship to the current weapon.
canBorrow() - Method in class Borrow
Method to check whether the player can borrow more fish.
canHunt() - Method in class Catch
Method to check if the player can complete the Catch action.
Catch - Class in <Unnamed>
Class which stores the information relating to the Catch action for the game.
Catch() - Constructor for class Catch
Default constructor which creates an object derived from the Catch class (not used).
Catch(Player, String[][]) - Constructor for class Catch
Non-default constructor which creates an object derived from the Catch class.
catchFish() - Method in class Catch
Core method for the catch fish action tying in all the other sub-methods.
createLoan(int) - Method in class Shark
Creates a new loan, adding the amount to the loanValues array and adding a new turn value to the loanTurns array.Both the turnLoan and totalLoan variables are increased.

D

decreaseCurrentFish(int) - Method in class Player
Decreases the currentFish value
decreaseLoanTurn() - Method in class Shark
Checks if any loans are present, then decreases each value in the loan turns array by 1 (triggered at the end of each round).
decreaseTotalLoan(int) - Method in class Shark
Decreases the balance of the totalLoan variable.
display() - Method in class Weapon
Method to display each variable for the Weapon object.
displayWeapons() - Method in class Catch
Method to loop through the available weapons array and attach to the associated key, returning string (used in the selectWeapons method).
dueRepayment() - Method in class Shark
This method iterates through the loanTurns array, checking if any are equal to zero.

E

endGame() - Method in class Game
Trigger final steps of the game, writing to the results file
endTurn() - Method in class Game
Method ends turn and starts sequence of checking game over conditions

Method for adding text decoration
loanDue() - Method in class Shark
Checks if any current loans withing the loanTurns array equals 0 (meaning they are due)
lowerHuntCount() - Method in class Catch
Method to reduce the hunt count (occuring after each "hunt" which was assumed to be Catch).

Used in story mode to repay all outstanding loans
rollFishTarget() - Method in class Game
Generate a number between 10 & 20 and set fish target to this amount
rollNaturalDisaster() - Method in class Game
Generate a number between 1 & 100, if it matches number then 1% natural disaster occurs.
rollPredatorPremium() - Method in class Game
Generate a number between 1 & 10 and set predator premium to this amount
run() - Method in class Hunter
Create game object and start game

W
